CLKDIV.description: The integral part of the frequency divider factor.

FRAG.description: The decimal part of the frequency divider factor.

GLITCH_FILT.description: when input pulse width is lower than this value, the pulse is ignored.

GLITCH_FILT_EN.description: Set this bit to enable Rx signal filter.

RXFIFO_CNT.description: Stores the byte number of valid data in Rx-FIFO.

DSRN.description: The register represent the level value of the internal uart dsr signal.

CTSN.description: This register represent the level value of the internal uart cts signal.

RXD.description: This register represent the  level value of the internal uart rxd signal.

TXFIFO_CNT.description: Stores the byte number of data in Tx-FIFO.

DTRN.description: This bit represents the level of the internal uart dtr signal.

RTSN.description: This bit represents the level of the internal uart rts signal.

TXD.description: This bit represents the  level of the internal uart txd signal.

PARITY.description: This register is used to configure the parity check mode.

PARITY_EN.description: Set this bit to enable uart parity check.

BIT_NUM.description: This register is used to set the length of data.

STOP_BIT_NUM.description: This register is used to set the length of  stop bit.

SW_RTS.description: This register is used to configure the software rts signal which is used in software flow control.

SW_DTR.description: This register is used to configure the software dtr signal which is used in software flow control.

TXD_BRK.description: Set this bit to enbale transmitter to  send NULL when the process of sending data is done.

IRDA_DPLX.description: Set this bit to enable IrDA loopback mode.

IRDA_TX_EN.description: This is the start enable bit for IrDA transmitter.

IRDA_WCTL.description: 1'h1: The IrDA transmitter's 11th bit is the same as 10th bit. 1'h0: Set IrDA transmitter's 11th bit to 0.

IRDA_TX_INV.description: Set this bit to invert the level of  IrDA transmitter.

IRDA_RX_INV.description: Set this bit to invert the level of IrDA receiver.

LOOPBACK.description: Set this bit to enable uart loopback test mode.

TX_FLOW_EN.description: Set this bit to enable flow control function for transmitter.

IRDA_EN.description: Set this bit to enable IrDA protocol.

RXFIFO_RST.description: Set this bit to reset the uart receive-FIFO.

TXFIFO_RST.description: Set this bit to reset the uart transmit-FIFO.

RXD_INV.description: Set this bit to inverse the level value of uart rxd signal.

CTS_INV.description: Set this bit to inverse the level value of uart cts signal.

DSR_INV.description: Set this bit to inverse the level value of uart dsr signal.

TXD_INV.description: Set this bit to inverse the level value of uart txd signal.

RTS_INV.description: Set this bit to inverse the level value of uart rts signal.

DTR_INV.description: Set this bit to inverse the level value of uart dtr signal.

CLK_EN.description: 1'h1: Force clock on for register. 1'h0: Support clock only when application writes registers.

ERR_WR_MASK.description: 1'h1: Receiver stops storing data into FIFO when data is wrong. 1'h0: Receiver stores the data even if the  received data is wrong.

AUTOBAUD_EN.description: This is the enable bit for detecting baudrate.

MEM_CLK_EN.description: UART memory clock gate enable signal.

RXFIFO_FULL_THRHD.description: It will produce rxfifo_full_int interrupt when receiver receives more data than this register value.

TXFIFO_EMPTY_THRHD.description: It will produce txfifo_empty_int interrupt when the data amount in Tx-FIFO is less than this register value.

DIS_RX_DAT_OVF.description: Disable UART Rx data overflow detect.

RX_TOUT_FLOW_DIS.description: Set this bit to stop accumulating idle_cnt when hardware flow control works.

RX_FLOW_EN.description: This is the flow enable bit for UART receiver.

RX_TOUT_EN.description: This is the enble bit for uart receiver's timeout function.

MIN_CNT.description: This register stores the value of the minimum duration time of the low level pulse. It is used in baud rate-detect process.
This register stores  the value of the maxinum duration time for the high level pulse. It is used in baud rate-detect process.

RXD_EDGE_CNT.description: This register stores the count of rxd edge change. It is used in baud rate-detect process.

SW_FLOW_CON_EN.description: Set this bit to enable software flow control. It is used with register sw_xon or sw_xoff.

XONOFF_DEL.description: Set this bit to remove flow control char from the received data.

FORCE_XON.description: Set this bit to enable the transmitter to go on sending data.

FORCE_XOFF.description: Set this bit to stop the  transmitter from sending data.

SEND_XON.description: Set this bit to send Xon char. It is cleared by hardware automatically.

SEND_XOFF.description: Set this bit to send Xoff char. It is cleared by hardware automatically.

ACTIVE_THRESHOLD.description: The uart is activated from light sleeping mode when the input rxd edge changes more times than this register value.

XOFF_THRESHOLD.description: When the data amount in Rx-FIFO is more than this register value with uart_sw_flow_con_en set to 1, it will send a Xoff char.

XOFF_CHAR.description: This register stores the Xoff flow control char.

XON_THRESHOLD.description: When the data amount in Rx-FIFO is less than this register value with uart_sw_flow_con_en set to 1, it will send a Xon char.

XON_CHAR.description: This register stores the Xon flow control char.

TX_BRK_NUM.description: This register is used to configure the number of 0 to be sent after the process of sending data is done. It is active when txd_brk is set to 1.

RX_IDLE_THRHD.description: It will produce frame end signal when receiver takes more time to receive one byte data than this register value.

TX_IDLE_NUM.description: This register is used to configure the duration time between transfers.

RS485_EN.description: Set this bit to choose the rs485 mode.

DL0_EN.description: Set this bit to delay the stop bit by 1 bit.

DL1_EN.description: Set this bit to delay the stop bit by 1 bit.

RS485TX_RX_EN.description: Set this bit to enable receiver could receive data when the transmitter is transmitting data in rs485 mode.

RS485RXBY_TX_EN.description: 1'h1: enable rs485 transmitter to send data when rs485 receiver line is busy.

RS485_RX_DLY_NUM.description: This register is used to delay the receiver's internal data signal.

RS485_TX_DLY_NUM.description: This register is used to delay the transmitter's internal data signal.

PRE_IDLE_NUM.description: This register is used to configure the idle duration time before the first at_cmd is received by receiver.

POST_IDLE_NUM.description: This register is used to configure the duration time between the last at_cmd and the next data.

RX_GAP_TOUT.description: This register is used to configure the duration time between the at_cmd chars.

AT_CMD_CHAR.description: This register is used to configure the content of at_cmd char.

CHAR_NUM.description: This register is used to configure the num of continuous at_cmd chars received by receiver.

RX_SIZE.description: This register is used to configure the amount of mem allocated for receive-FIFO. The default number is 128 bytes.

TX_SIZE.description: This register is used to configure the amount of mem allocated for transmit-FIFO. The default number is 128 bytes.

RX_FLOW_THRHD.description: This register is used to configure the maximum amount of data that can be received  when hardware flow control works.

RX_TOUT_THRHD.description: This register is used to configure the threshold time that receiver takes to receive one byte. The rxfifo_tout_int interrupt will be trigger when the receiver takes more time to receive one byte with rx_tout_en set to 1.

MEM_FORCE_PD.description: Set this bit to force power down UART memory.

MEM_FORCE_PU.description: Set this bit to force power up UART memory.

APB_TX_WADDR.description: This register stores the offset address in Tx-FIFO when software writes Tx-FIFO via APB.

TX_RADDR.description: This register stores the offset address in Tx-FIFO when Tx-FSM reads data via Tx-FIFO_Ctrl.

APB_RX_RADDR.description: This register stores the offset address in RX-FIFO when software reads data from Rx-FIFO via APB. UART0 is 10'h100. UART1 is 10'h180.

RX_WADDR.description: This register stores the offset address in Rx-FIFO when Rx-FIFO_Ctrl writes Rx-FIFO. UART0 is 10'h100. UART1 is 10'h180.

ST_URX_OUT.description: This is the status register of receiver.

ST_UTX_OUT.description: This is the status register of transmitter.

POSEDGE_MIN_CNT.description: This register stores the minimal input clock count between two positive edges. It is used in boudrate-detect process.

NEGEDGE_MIN_CNT.description: This register stores the minimal input clock count between two negative edges. It is used in boudrate-detect process.

SCLK_DIV_B.description: The  denominator of the frequency divider factor.

SCLK_DIV_A.description: The numerator of the frequency divider factor.

SCLK_DIV_NUM.description: The integral part of the frequency divider factor.

SCLK_EN.description: Set this bit to enable UART Tx/Rx clock.

RST_CORE.description: Write 1 then write 0 to this bit, reset UART Tx/Rx.

TX_SCLK_EN.description: Set this bit to enable UART Tx clock.

RX_SCLK_EN.description: Set this bit to enable UART Rx clock.

TX_RST_CORE.description: Write 1 then write 0 to this bit, reset UART Tx.

RX_RST_CORE.description: Write 1 then write 0 to this bit, reset UART Rx.

ID.description: This register is used to configure the uart_id.

HIGH_SPEED.description: This bit used to select synchronize mode. 1: Registers are auto synchronized into UART Core clock and UART core should be keep the same with APB clock. 0: After configure registers, software needs to write 1 to UART_REG_UPDATE to synchronize registers.

REG_UPDATE.description: Software write 1 would synchronize registers into UART Core clock domain and would be cleared by hardware after synchronization is done.
